content: I noticed -- so I think one of the things, as an analyst, I've been  on your stock since I initiated, I think there's a lot of interesting opportunity here with the Solcius acquisition, and how a lot of that, that was driven in a lot of ways by kind of the crazy run up in the stock price part of the -- GameStop, and the meme stocks and everything that gave you the opportunity to sell shares at a very, I think, $15 a share or something for pretty -- reasons we all recognize and understand as an anomaly, but you guys were able to, in a savvy intelligent way, take advantage of that at the time.
